title: Ruby Rubber Tree
description: The Ruby Rubber Tree is easy for beginners and a great starter plant! They can quickly grow up to 8' inside and do best in bright to moderate indirect light.

title: Fiddle Leaf Fig
description: Fiddle Leaf Figs, 'Ficus Lyrata', are gorgeous plants known for their large leaves and vibrant green colors.

title: Neoregelia Bromeliad
description: The Neoregelia Bromeliad is a special bromeliad because they grow short and wide. They are a statement piece in any space.

title: Cordyline Glauca Good Luck Plant
description: Grows 9-13 feet tall showing off their fan-like leaves growing as a spiral in clusters up the slender main stalk.

title: Calathea Concinna 'Freddy'
description: A stunning tropical plant with patterned leaves featuring shades of deep green and burgundy undersides.

title: ZZ Plant
description: This is a hardy and low-maintenance tropical plant with glossy, dark green leaves that can thrive in low light conditions.

title: Goldon Pothos
description: This is a popular and easy-to-care-for trailing plant with heart-shaped leaves featuring variegation in shades of green and yellow.

title: Philodendron Birkin
description: This plants foliage becomes more variegated as they mature and has an upright growth habit. As they unfurl, their leaves show tinges of pink and red.

title: English Ivy Green Ideal
description: An ideal trailing plant for indoor or outdoor settings with its elegant, evergreen foliage that can be grown in a variety of conditions and can also help purify the air.

title: Pink Polka Dot Plant
description: This is a charming and colorful plant with spotted pink leaves that can add a pop of color to any indoor space.

title: Marginata Cane Dragon Tree (Dracaena)
description: A striking and low-maintenance plant with thin, spiky leaves that feature a red margin, making it a popular choice for indoor d√©cor.

title: Bird of Paradise
description: A striking tropical plant with large, ornamental leaves and colorful, bird-shaped flowers that resemble a bird in flight.
